review_text: First the pros: 1:Good value.  2: Moves a lot of air.  3: Reversible is great.Now the cons:  1: Very noisy on LOW speed.  2: Noise level is higher in reverse from added blade noise.  3 Very difficult to mount in window.I bought it for my bedroom but decided that due to the noise it was better suited to the living room. Still a good value but with  a couple caveats.
product_name: Lasko #2155A Electrically Reversible Window Fan, 16 Inches
